channel.title: Need help with 525!@@ please help!
channel.description: right for 2 days now ive been trying to look for the command section, this is why because i want to make a command like ::bh to go to bounty hunter. for my 2nd thing is pvp drops, i want it so that pvp armor like vesta an zuzial would drop from other players, but idk how to do that an i want to make them a rare drop. btw im useing xx-scape 525 source please help anyone : (
